AUTHOR: Paddolicious#8880
NAME: Goodreads
SHORT: Search for a book on Goodreads
INSTALL_MSG: Thank you for using this cog. This cog needs the `xmltodict` library to function, so run `pip3 install xmltodict`. Also, don't forget to set the API key with `[p]goodreadsapi [key]`!
DESCRIPTION: Search for a book on Goodreads
